name: mudcat - reorder index columns
description:
Moves the number-of-messages column to the left of the index page. 
Version 2 13-10-2017
additional_info:
This userstyle is designed for small displays, so that you can zoom in without the number of messages and associated multi-page links disappearing off the screen.
It also makes the 'd' link wider to make it easier to tap.

Can be combined with the 'mudcat compact forum' userstyle.
